moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Breathtaking!
moves.effect: Reduces the sync move countdown of an allied sync pair by two and raises the accuracy and critical-hit rate of the sync pair selected. Sharply raises accuracy and critical-hit rate when the user’s team has a sync buff.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.effect: Never misses when the weather is rainy. Has a moderate chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

passives.name: Look Alive 9
passives.description: Increases the user’s evasiveness when the user is hit by an attack move.
